Sentence_location: Based on molecular clock estimates (sensu Knowlton et al. 1993; Brower et al. 1994; Quek et al. 2004), these divergent lineages were estimated to have been isolated within the last 5 million years (range: 2.2-7.5my), a time when the Western Antarctic Ice Sheet (WAIS) was thought to have completely collapsed (Pollard & Deconto 2009).

Sentence_species: ACL1922;4 D. cerinum ------------- soeeecereccee: ACL1799 Z. tuberculata ----------------------- AAZ6212 Isothraulus abditus -----------------
Sentence_location: Understanding the effects of climate change within Antarctica could furthermore provide insight into the potential impacts of such changes, worldwide.

Sentence_location: This thesis examines the genetic diversity of invertebrate groups from Antarctica and New Zealand to gain an understanding of current baseline levels of variability and to facilitate their use as indicators of environmental change.

Sentence_location: I also examined mitochondrial DNA (COD) sequences for three Antarctic springtail (Collembola) species collected from sites in the vicinity, and to the north of, the Mackay Glacier (77°S) within the Ross Sea region.

Sentence_location: Based on molecular clock estimates (sensu Knowlton et al. 1993; Brower et al. 1994; Quek et al. 2004), these divergent lineages were estimated to have been isolated within the last 5 million years (range: 2.2-7.5my), a time when the Western Antarctic Ice Sheet (WAIS) was thought to have completely collapsed (Pollard & Deconto 2009).

Sentence_location: This thesis examines the genetic diversity of invertebrate groups from Antarctica and New Zealand to gain an understanding of current baseline levels of variability and to facilitate their use as indicators of environmental change.

Sentence_location: I also examined mitochondrial DNA (COD) sequences for three Antarctic springtail (Collembola) species collected from sites in the vicinity, and to the north of, the Mackay Glacier (77°S) within the Ross Sea region.

Sentence_location: Stevens MI, Hogg ID (2003) Long-term isolation and recent range expansion from glacial refugia revealed for the endemic springtail Gomphiocephalus hodgsoni from Victoria Land, Antarctica.

Sentence_species: For example, only one species of springtail (Gomphiocephalus hodgsoni) is known from the McMurdo Dry Valleys, whereas an additional two species (Antarcticinella monoculata and Cryptopygus nivicolis) are found north of the Dry Valleys (Adams et al. 2006; Hogg et al. 2014).
Sentence_location: This thesis examines the genetic diversity of invertebrate groups from Antarctica and New Zealand to gain an understanding of current baseline levels of variability and to facilitate their use as indicators of environmental change.

Sentence_species: For example, only one species of springtail (Gomphiocephalus hodgsoni) is known from the McMurdo Dry Valleys, whereas an additional two species (Antarcticinella monoculata and Cryptopygus nivicolis) are found north of the Dry Valleys (Adams et al. 2006; Hogg et al. 2014).
Sentence_location: I also examined mitochondrial DNA (COD) sequences for three Antarctic springtail (Collembola) species collected from sites in the vicinity, and to the north of, the Mackay Glacier (77°S) within the Ross Sea region.

Sentence_species: For example, only one species of springtail (Gomphiocephalus hodgsoni) is known from the McMurdo Dry Valleys, whereas an additional two species (Antarcticinella monoculata and Cryptopygus nivicolis) are found north of the Dry Valleys (Adams et al. 2006; Hogg et al. 2014).
Sentence_location: This area represents a transitional zone between two biogeographic regions (North and South Victoria Land).

Sentence_species: For example, only one species of springtail (Gomphiocephalus hodgsoni) is known from the McMurdo Dry Valleys, whereas an additional two species (Antarcticinella monoculata and Cryptopygus nivicolis) are found north of the Dry Valleys (Adams et al. 2006; Hogg et al. 2014).
Sentence_location: Based on molecular clock estimates, these divergent lineages were likely to have been isolated for 3-5 million years, a time when the Western Antarctic Ice Sheet (WAIS) was thought to have completely collapsed.

Sentence_location: My second research chapter (Chapter III) assessed the fine scale diversity and distribution of three species of Antarctic Collembola found throughout and to the north of, the Mackay Glacier located within the Ross Sea region.

Sentence_location: Based on molecular clock estimates (sensu Knowlton et al. 1993; Brower et al. 1994; Quek et al. 2004), these divergent lineages were estimated to have been isolated within the last 5 million years (range: 2.2-7.5my), a time when the Western Antarctic Ice Sheet (WAIS) was thought to have completely collapsed (Pollard & Deconto 2009).
